name: Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy
summary:
Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy presents the eight sects and classic plot in the popular novel Jade Dynasty. With advanced technology the game not only presents the classic eighteen areas but also expanded the world! The Mortal Realm is within your reach.
In this world there are so many amazing things for you to see! You can ride a sword and fly into the sky or down into the ocean. Wherever you go, you can find something new! The game involved elements, terrains and brand new turn-based combat system, which means every step you take can make a difference!
